briefdescription.para: Disable the noise sensor module and stop adc scan.

simplesect.para: In case of any other error code refer AdcCentral_StopScan

briefdescription.para: Enable the noise sensor, Configure the ADC parameters and start ADC scan.

parameterdescription.para: if the Adc resource handle is NULL

simplesect.para: In case of any other error code refer AdcCentral_StartScan
Channel-4 is used for ADC to read the noise sensor data. ADC Resolution as 12 bit

briefdescription.para: To read the last calculated RMS voltage.

parameterdescription.para: Calculated RMS voltage for the range of 256 samples
in milli seconds Timeout to read the RmsVoltage
if no data available on queue

simplesect.para: If the calculated value isn't available in queue then it will wait until the data availability

briefdescription.para: Initialize the required components and variables of noise sensor module.
